attributes.action: License every football club in the United Kingdom to swear allegiance to Her Britannic Majesty the Queen or be banned from operating.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is becoming more apparent every day that to ensure the continuance of the Union and demonstrate a dignified level of support for the institutions of Great Britain, every sporting organisation should pledge allegiance and an oath of fealty to Queen Elizabeth the 2nd of England and 1st of the United Kingdom or be forced to cease operating for 12 months. The license should be available for immediate inspection by a new regulatory force called the Directorate Of Britishness. Clubs not complying or complying half-heartedly should be penalised and the club beneath them take their place as winners and representatives in Europe.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
